item.title: [PI] Adding Nex
item.dc:creator: @doritos_own doritos own
item.description:
@doritos_own wrote:

Just like the whole part…

I get errors after im done with everything saying -

Java\Class36.java:18: error: illegal start of expression public static void load_647(int file){ ^ Java\Class36.java:18: error: illegal start of expression public static void load_647(int file){ ^ Java\Class36.java:18: error: ';' expected public static void load_647(int file){ ^ Java\Class36.java:18: error: '.class' expected public static void load_647(int file){ ^ Java\Class36.java:18: error: ';' expected public static void load_647(int file){ ^ 5 errors Press any key to continue . . .

And i don’t get what to do at this part -

[code]Okay where it says:

Stream stream = new Stream(FileOperations.ReadFile(signlink.findcachedir() + “/Data/Animation/frames/”+file+".dat"));

Change the path to yours.[/code]

And also, half the lines of code the tutorial is telling me to search for isnt there.
